WRITING.TEXT: What if you counteract the stretching with a molecular squeezing device?

Flight attendants being unsympathetic hardliners with condescending, self-righteous attitudes? Well I never! Most flight attendants are like that woman in the video, all they want to do is get to their location on time while making sure their passengers are being publicly shamed in the process.
Older ladies need to speak up because anybody else would've probably been dragged off the plane for questioning authority.
It's really been something to see Chris Ray Gun's video making talent improve over time.
Radical Muslims killing innocents on a daily basis should make you sadder.
Nobody in here is calling Muslims "subhumans". Maybe reevaluate your defensiveness on the subject.
